title: Tweetings for Twitter v8.6.3.1
description:
A beautiful Twitter client to immerse yourself in the Twitter experience.

Beautiful themes, including a full Material Design experience, powerful features and highly customizable.

âœ“ True Push Notifications - Runs over 3G or WiFi for mentions, Direct Messages, when you get a new follower, when you are retweeted, quoted or liked, etc. You don't even need the app open! We don't keep connections open to Twitter on your device, our push servers do all the hard work so your battery doesn't suffer.

âœ“ Never miss a thing for your account activities. In addition to push notifications, real time updates provide a great experience.

âœ“ 32 Beautiful Material Design themes for Android Lollipop, 16 light, 16 dark

âœ“ Full support for Retweet with Comment in both sending, showing and receiving push notifications

âœ“ Support for Android 6.0 Marshmallow

âœ“ Powerful customisation to the navigation of the app. You are in total control of your experience. Don't want liked tweets, no problem, just remove those sections. With Tweetings you can even have a list timeline as your main timeline rather than home.

âœ“ Stacked timeline. A great new way to view your Tweets. View your home timeline grouped by the user's who posted them.

âœ“ New style Twitter quoted retweet support directly on the timeline. Send quoted Tweets, get notifications when you are quoted and even have them delivered to your mentions timeline.

âœ“ Post Gifs directly to Twitter using Giphy

âœ“ Multiple Twitter photo support
âœ“ Clickable links in your timeline, long press links for more options
âœ“ Long press tweets for quick actions
âœ“ Animated Gif posting and viewing support
âœ“ Twitter video viewing support
âœ“ Android Wear support! View your timeline and reply directly to a notification. You can also send a new Tweet directly from your watch!
âœ“ Realtime streaming updates, total optional. Can even run in the background
âœ“ Chat Heads for received Direct Messages
âœ“ Beautiful Card UI and Drawer navigation
âœ“ Wonderful, rich, high-quality image previews, including beautiful parallax effect and swipe down to close
âœ“ Light, dark and hybrid themes
âœ“ Powerful theme builder, allowing you to create, download and share custom themes
âœ“ Multiple Twitter accounts
âœ“ Save as many draft tweets as you want
âœ“ Internal Web browser
âœ“ Mute users, hashtags, keywords and clients, with official Twitter mute user syncing and auto-expiry
âœ“ Muffle users, they still show in your timeline, just less prominently
âœ“ Clickable links in the timeline
âœ“ Search your own timelines
âœ“ Twitlonger support
âœ“ Tweetmarker timeline sync for Home, Mentions, Lists and Saved Searches
âœ“ Customizable navigation. Put whatever is important to you at the forefront
âœ“ Dashclock integration
âœ“ Chrome tabs support
âœ“ Timeline and mention widgets
âœ“ Parallax timeline effect
âœ“ Support back to Android 4.0.3 ICS

âœ“ And a whole lot more...

What's New:

v8.6.3
- Dark theme fixes for search windows

More Info:
 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dwdesign.tweetings
